message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a steal! I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand you're looking for a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $130.
I appreciate the compromise, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for it.
I'm willing to be more flexible, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $125.
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
